topic.title: Mellow Mushroom
topic.shortdesc: Visit this funky, art-filled chain pizzeria featuring craft beer, calzones & creative stone-baked pizzas located in the heart of downtown Blacksburg.

body.p: Known for their artsy vibe inspired by the 1970s, Mellow Mushroom has become a crowd favorite, as well as mine. They have a vast assortment of specialty pizzas that are fun to try. But if you are set on paving your own path and would like to create your own pizza, they have a build-your-own option as well. They have their own signature dough recipe comprised of the original 1974 combination of five carefully curated ingredients, which truly makes their pizza one-of-a-kind. My favorite pizza to order is their signature Great White pizza, which has an olive oil and garlic base and is topped with sun-dried tomatoes, provolone, feta, seasoned ricotta, fresh basil, mozzarella, roma tomatoes, and onions. The atmosphere is very friendly and welcoming, making it a great place to celebrate special occasions or just hang out! If you haven't been here, you should definitely try it and broaden your pizza horizons. I know I'll be going back to it time and time again!
